subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
Head (Body Part)
lead_paragraph: Some former N.H.L. players, all of whom sustained concussions during their careers, said the league’s new rules to stem hits to the head will help skill players like Sidney Crosby.
snippet: Some former N.H.L. players, all of whom sustained concussions during their careers, said the league’s new rules to stem hits to the head will help skill players like Sidney Crosby.
